# Welcome to MatCron üëã

MatCron is an innovative mattress tracking system that combines robust backend services with a user-friendly mobile application.

## üöÄ Our Projects

### MatCron Backend
Repository Link: [Click Here](https://github.com/MatCron/MatCron) \
A powerful .NET-based API service built with .NET 8.0 that provides:
- üîê Secure JWT-based authentication
- üìä MySQL database integration with Entity Framework Core
- üê≥ Multi-platform Docker support (Windows, Mac, Linux, Raspberry Pi)
- üìö Comprehensive API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI
- üèóÔ∏è Clean architecture using Repository Pattern

### MatCron Frontend
Repository Link: [Click Here](https://github.com/MatCron/Matcron-Frontend)  \
A Flutter-based mobile application that offers:
- üì± Cross-platform support (iOS and Android)  
- üé® Modern and intuitive user interface  
- üîÑ Real-time data synchronization  
- üìä Comprehensive mattress tracking features
